transcript:
College a scam let's see since the 1990s
the average starting salary for a
college graduate has gone up just 16
percent but College tuition and fees
have gone up 213 leaving the average
college graduate with between 39 to 50
000 in college debt and approximately 20
percent of them are behind on all of
their student loans also massive
companies like Google Apple IBM and
Tesla have all removed the requirement
for a college degree to work for them we
live in a different world now and
college is not necessary for financial
success anymore College used to be about
educating the masses but now it seems
like it's about extracting as much money
as possible from the masses and when you
look at a scam what is a scam well the
definition of a scam is a fraudulent or
deceptive scheme that is designed to
deceive or defraud people in order to
obtain money so it's College a scam you
tell me
